name: Procedural Generation ? no mr bond...this is Random Generation made with gdevelop
name_original: Procedural Generation ? no mr bond...this is Random Generation made with gdevelop
description:
The Warehouse (working title)...is a 5x5 grid ... set of rooms...with obstacles, enemies and treasure. This was created with about 2 hours of coding and about 25 hours on the assets(not really).

and all of this code is NOT discussed in the accompanying youtube video.
